name: Lambda@Edge Viewer Request Minimal
description: CloudFront Viewer Request イベントでヘッダ追加する最小例。

files.template: exports.handler = async (event) => { const req = event.Records[0].cf.request; req.headers['x-powered-by'] = [{ key: 'X-Powered-By', value: 'fluorite' }]; return req; };
Lambda@Edge 用に N. Virginia (us-east-1) にデプロイしてください。
